items.sentence: Tom decided not to tell Mary that he was leaving.
Tom decided to go on a diet and lose some weight.
Tom definitely needs to spend more time studying.
Tom read Mary\'s message, but he didn\'t respond.
I\'ve never been to a professional baseball game.
I\'m not going to tell Tom why I didn\'t do that.
When Mary finds out about it she\'ll throw a fit.
A Mr. Jackson came to see you while you were out.
I don\'t think anyone noticed what Tom was doing.
I don\'t think that Tom will be worried about us.
Some people say you should never assume anything.
I\'m not going to leave if you don\'t want me to.
I hope Tom has enough money to buy what he needs.
I just found out Tom did the same thing Mary did.
Tom doesn\'t get along well with Mary\'s friends.
I\'ll miss you so much when you leave in October.
I haven\'t had a chance to be alone with Tom yet.
Tom usually walks to school if it\'s not raining.
Tom waited for Mary to say more, but she didn\'t.
Tom knew that he couldn\'t turn to Mary for help.
